name: KILL or KILL
description:
AWD to move and jump

S to recharge your gun

Left-click to shoot

Once you kill the dragon you're done... I've been working on this game for too long!!  There are only 2 levels but if i get enough interest from  people, i'm going to finish the work.

I've created this shooter game but i think the best parts are the conversations between all the characters...
